item.description:
Develop your core strength and overall flexibility! Primary focus will be placed on exercises that serve to strengthen the abdominal and lower back regions, while also working on the muscles throughout the pelvic girdle critical to healthy posture and stability. 

 

 

 

Aside from stronger abs and decreased back pain, this class will improve your balance and the overall quality of your movement with an exercise program developed for and used by professional dancers of the Masacote Dance Company.


For Dancers AND Non-Dancers Alike:

 

 

Dancers will learn critical elements of core stability while executing safe and effective flexibility exercises fused from various genres of dance: modern, jazz, ballet, and even cirque.


Athletes will develop more flexibility in everyday movement critical to lengthening the body and making one more agile and limber in sports while instilling stability techniques for a more grounded center and balance control.


Cost: $12 drop in
